item.description:
Join us for the three mile back country hike from the Pinkham Notch Visitors Center to see the skiers on Tuckerman Ravine on the side of Mt Washington. These skiers hike up the ravine and then descend telemarking on the snow.

Once at the base of ravine, we can hike further up or head back down.

I have site 48 reserved at Dolly Copp Campground from Friday 5/22 - Monday 5/25 (Memorial Day). The campground is 5 miles beyond the trailhead. My site has space for 8 people and two cars. So you can join me assuming you can carpool or manage cars and will share in the site fee. I'll be driving up on Saturday afternoon 5/23.

You are also welcome to reserve your own site at www.recreation.gov. Please indicate your site # in your RSVP. If you are waitlisted and you have your own site, then I'll add you the "YES" RSVP list.

We'll coordinate food once we know who's going.

If you aren't sure, then please RSVP "No" and indicate in your comment that you might change your mind.

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Hike to Tuckerman Ravine to See the Telemark Skiers
